meanings.definition: The quality or state of being pungent.
meanings.sent1: The pungencies of the spicy chili made my eyes water.
meanings.sent2: I could smell the pungencies of onions cooking in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The pungencies of the garlic were so strong that they chased away the vampires.
meanings.sent4: The pungencies of the situation left a bitter taste in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The pungencies of the perfume lingered in the air long after she left.

meanings.sent1: The pungencies of the cheese were too strong for my liking.
meanings.sent2: The pungencies of the flowers filled the room with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent3: The pungencies of the spicy sauce made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The pungencies of the campfire smoke clung to our clothes all night.
meanings.sent5: The pungencies of the freshly baked bread drew me into the bakery.
